meanings.definition: Neatly or trimly smart in dress or appearance.
meanings.sent1: She always looks nattier than anyone else at the party.
meanings.sent2: The gentleman wore a nattier suit to the event.
meanings.sent3: His nattier outfit made his friends jealous.
meanings.sent4: Her nattier attire shone like a beacon in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The nattier clothing made her stand out in the room.

meanings.definition: A person who dresses stylishly or fashionably.
meanings.sent1: She is known as the nattier in our group for her impeccable style.
meanings.sent2: The fashion show featured many nattiers from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The nattier always turns heads when walking down the street.
meanings.sent4: He was the nattier of the office, always setting trends.
meanings.sent5: The young actress quickly became a nattier in the industry.
